exams.title: UPSC Civil Services
exams.description: Union Public Service Commission exam for IAS, IPS, IFS, and other civil services.
exams.eligibility: Graduation in any stream, Age 21-32 years (relaxation for reserved categories)
exams.examFrequency: Once a year (Prelims in May/June, Mains in September, Interview in March-April)

exams.title: GPSC (Gujarat Public Service Commission)
exams.description: State-level civil services exam for various government posts in Gujarat.
exams.eligibility: Graduation, Age 20-35 years (varies by post), Gujarat domicile
exams.examFrequency: Multiple times a year (varies by post)

exams.title: Banking Exams (IBPS, SBI)
exams.description: Exams for bank jobs including PO, Clerk, and Specialist Officer posts.

exams.title: SSC (Staff Selection Commission)
exams.description: Exams for various government posts like CGL, CHSL, MTS, and more.

exams.title: NEET (National Eligibility cum Entrance Test)
exams.description: Medical entrance exam for MBBS, BDS, and other medical courses.
exams.eligibility: 12th with Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Age 17-25 years

exams.title: JEE (Joint Entrance Examination)
exams.description: Engineering entrance exam for IITs, NITs, and other engineering colleges.
exams.eligibility: 12th with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Age limit varies
exams.examFrequency: JEE Main: Twice a year, JEE Advanced: Once a year

exams.title: Teaching Exams (CTET, TET)
exams.description: Exams for teaching jobs in schools (Primary and Upper Primary).

exams.title: Defence Exams (NDA, CDS)
exams.description: Exams for joining Indian Army, Navy, and Air Force as officers.
